name: Hồ Bích Ngọc
description:
'''Hồ Bích Ngọc''' (born April 13 1983), stage name '''Ho Bich Ngoc''', is a Vietnamese singer-songwriter and celebrity. She rose to fame in 2003 after winning the [[:vi:Tiếng hát Truyền hình Thành phố Hồ Chí Minh|Television Voice Contest Tiếng hát Truyền hình HTV]].

Ho Bich Ngoc regularly performs in music shows, TV shows and other public events in Vietnam.
